job_description: MailChannels is looking for a bright, self starter to work independently on some special projects during the summer work term. The successful candidate will gain valuable experience working with leading edge security techniques, on a cloud based service, to combat email abuse at is source. You want to work with a tight knit team that has a proven track record of over ten years in the industry, but still operates with the scrappiness of a startup. You should have experience with Javascript, Ruby and Java. Ideally, you will have some previous work experience and understand the concepts of continuous integration, automated deployment and configuration management.
